description: Bhimtal is a charming lake city named after the mythological character Bhima from Mahabharata. Located at an altitude of 1,370 meters, it is gaining popularity due to its proximity to Nainital and affordable yet elegant hotels. The city’s centerpiece is the picturesque Bhimtal Lake, perfect for boating and surrounded by lush greenery. Bhimtal offers a range of stately hotels at lower prices compared to Nainital. It’s a serene destination with warm hospitality and scenic surroundings, attracting budget-conscious travelers. Explore attractions like the Bhimeshwar Temple during your visit.
name: Bhimtal
